errors.error_description: Missing clear installation instructions in a prominent location
correction_candidates:
## Installation

Install PyLabRobot using pip:

```bash
pip install pylabrobot
```

## Quick Start

First install PyLabRobot:

```bash
pip install pylabrobot
```

## Setup

To get started, install PyLabRobot:

```bash
pip install pylabrobot
```

## Getting Started

Install PyLabRobot with:

```bash
pip install pylabrobot
```
